spec_data.Name: python3-behave
spec_data.Description:
Behavior-driven development (or BDD) is an agile software development
technique that encourages collaboration between developers, QA and non-
technical or business participants in a software project.

behave uses tests written in a natural language style, backed up
by Python code.

Python 3 version.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 12:03:00 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Tools for the behavior-driven development, Python style
